alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 08 at 11:07AM EDT until August 08 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 115. * WHERE...Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...An Excessive Heat Warning means that a period of extremely hot temperatures and high humidity is expected, producing heat index values of 113 degrees or higher. These conditions will significantly increase the risk for heat related illnesses, particularly for people outdoors or in non air conditioned spaces.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to later this evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
